nodes.bodyText: I was not sure about the naming here. Initially I went with "required", but I felt that that was a bit too generic, so opted for a word where it's at least clear what is meant.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -113,6 +113,10 @@ unless overriden in the request using the `expand_wildcards` parameter,
 similar to <<index-hidden,hidden indices>>. This property must be set to the
 same value on all indices that share an alias. Defaults to `false`.
 
+`must_exist`::

nodes.bodyText: maybe also add a unit test for this validation logic?
I would prefer if the must_exist option was tested in its own test method, so that it is clear that this is feature with different behaviour.
The PR labels include 7.9.0 but this seems to exclude < v8.0.0. Kibana would benefit a lot from this if it was available in 7.x could this be backported?
These conditions are typically adjusted after backporting the PR (as it otherwise breaks CI when merging into master and running BWC mixed-version cluster tests). No need to worry.
